name: Condor

ski.name: BLADE BASH
desc: Condor wields a giant blade, smashing in a target direction after briefly charging. Deals large amount of physical damage to enemies in target range and slows movement by 30%. The longer Condor charges, the more damage is dealt. If charged for 1 second, causes Knockback for 1 second. Immune to CC while charging. Casts instantly and causes Knockback in Condor mode.
study: Charge up to deal damage and crowd control enemies

ski.name: FIST OF GRIEF
desc: Condor activates his avian impulses, earning one stack of Grief every 5 seconds to a maximum of 3. Triggering Fist of Grief deals physical damage and causes slowdown to a target enemy and surrounding area of enemies. Each Fist of Grief cast reduces cooldowns for Blade Bash by 2 seconds and Condor Soar by 4 seconds. Kills and assists grant one stack of Grief.
study: Area of effect damage and slows movement.

ski.name: CONDOR SOAR
desc: Unfolds arms to enter Condor Mode, increasing movement speed for 6 seconds and granting bonus vision. Abilities may be cast, but cannot make basic attacks. Re-casting charges toward enemies, dealing physical damage to targets hit and slowing movement for 2 seconds while increasing movement speed for 2 seconds.
study: Gain a buff and strengthen skill
update: Increases effect of buff and damage. Reduces cooldown

ski.name: SUBSUMED
desc: ACTIVE: loses health every second once cast, but increases damage dealt by basic attacks and abilities while increasing passive restoration effect. Casting ability cannot cause hero to die. PASSIVE: damaging enemy Heroes restores health. Effect is halved when damaging enemy Troops.
study: Imbues basic attacks with bonus damage and health regen
update: Increases damage and Health Regen effect

story: The legends told of Condor's combat skills, but none knew the torment of his lost wife. The bird was not only his mount, but also his best friend.
